job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: This is a remote opportunity. Only suitable candidates please apply.  experience with Python focusing on image and video processing. Working with public/private large-scale data sets of image/video  at least 1-2 year of deep learning (academy or industry) experience with TensorFlow.  Graduate degree on CS, CE or EE. Research experience on computer vision or machine learning. AI on the chip is a plus.  Kindly share your updated resume at parul@inabia.com and ayushi@inabia.com for a fast response.
